docs.title: Segmentation output
docs.description: Segmentation output file.

docs.title: Posteriors output
docs.description: Posterior probabilities output file.

docs.title: Probabilities output
docs.description: Probabilities output file, including post, prior, and likelihood.

docs.title: Mesh output
docs.description: Mesh output file (if save-mesh is enabled).

docs.title: samseg
docs.description: SAMSEG (Statistical and Algorithmic Methods for Segmentation) is a tool for segmenting neuroimaging data.

docs.title: Input files
docs.description: Input image files, must be in registration with each other.

docs.title: T1-weighted files
docs.description: T1-weighted input file, causes input to be conformed unless --hires is used.

docs.title: T2-weighted files
docs.description: T2-weighted input file.

docs.title: FLAIR-weighted files
docs.description: FLAIR-weighted input file.

docs.title: Other modality files
docs.description: Specific mode input files, each associated with a custom modality name.

docs.title: Output directory
docs.description: Output directory where results will be saved.

docs.title: Options file
docs.description: JSON file for specifying advanced options.

docs.title: Dissection photo mode
docs.description: Mode for processing 3D reconstructed dissection photos, specifying left/right/both.

docs.title: Save history flag
docs.description: Turns on saving of processing history.

docs.title: Subject
docs.description: Subject identifier, sets output directory to subject/mri/samseg. The first input must be the conformed T1 weighted input.

docs.title: Save posteriors flag
docs.description: Save posterior probabilities.

docs.title: Save probabilities flag
docs.description: Save posterior, prior, and likelihood as 3-frame volume for each tissue type.

docs.title: No save warp flag
docs.description: Do not save m3z-style warp.

docs.title: MRF flag
docs.description: Perform Markov Random Field processing.

docs.title: No MRF flag
docs.description: Do not perform Markov Random Field processing.

docs.title: Number of threads
docs.description: Set the number of CPUs to use.

docs.title: Atlas directory
docs.description: Path to the SAMSEG atlas directory.

docs.title: GMM file
docs.description: Gaussian Mixture Model file.

docs.title: No block coordinate descent flag
docs.description: Do not use block coordinate descent.

docs.title: Use logdomain cost and gradient calculator flag
docs.description: Use log-domain cost and gradient calculator.

docs.title: No logdomain cost and gradient calculator flag
docs.description: Do not use log-domain cost and gradient calculator.

docs.title: Recon flag
docs.description: Run recon-all.

docs.title: Fill flag
docs.description: Use samseg to create filled.mgz instead of recon-all.

docs.title: Normalization2 flag
docs.description: Use samseg to create brain.mgz instead of recon-all (with --recon).

docs.title: Use T2w flag
docs.description: Use the T2-weighted input when running recon-all.

docs.title: Use FLAIR flag
docs.description: Use the FLAIR-weighted input when running recon-all.

docs.title: Hires flag
docs.description: Use -hires when running recon-all.

docs.title: SUBJECTS_DIR
docs.description: Path to the SUBJECTS_DIR.

docs.title: Pallidum separate flag
docs.description: Move pallidum outside of global white matter class, used for analyzing T2 or FLAIR.

docs.title: Mesh stiffness
docs.description: Set mesh stiffness.

docs.title: Lesion flag
docs.description: Turn on lesion segmentation.

docs.title: Lesion mask pattern
docs.description: Pattern needed when using T2 for lesion mask, e.g., 0 1.

docs.title: Bias field smoothing kernel
docs.description: Width of bias field smoothness.

docs.title: Registration file
docs.description: Registration file (LTA or MAT) as output by samseg.

docs.title: Regmat file
docs.description: Same as --reg.

docs.title: Initial LTA file
docs.description: Initial registration LTA file.

docs.title: Reg only flag
docs.description: Only perform registration.

docs.title: SSDD directory
docs.description: Path to SAMSEG_Data_DIR where the atlas is located.

docs.title: Save mesh flag
docs.description: Save the mesh, useful for longitudinal analysis.

docs.title: Max iterations
docs.description: Maximum number of iterations.

docs.title: DICE file
docs.description: DICE coefficient file for segmentation.

docs.title: Ignore unknown flag
docs.description: Ignore unknown flags.

docs.title: Smooth WM cortex
docs.description: Smooth white matter and cortex priors using specified sigma value.

docs.title: Profile file
docs.description: Run using the cProfile Python profiler, with the specified profile file.

docs.title: samseg
docs.description: SAMSEG (Statistical and Algorithmic Methods for Segmentation) is a tool for segmenting neuroimaging data.
